name: Pacific Island Unity
description:
Pacific Island Unity is a horror adventure game in FPS. This is a DayNight. Reassured by daylight,find as much as possible things(food, FlashLight, LASER, Match...). So you resist it easier for monsters. When the sun goes down, find a light corner immediately. Otherwise, you will not see the monsters arrive.

Game Play :
The game is divided into 5 islands. First and second islands are available in the current downloadable version (1.04d).For other islands, wait until March 2014.Using FlashLight, Laser and others, fight against monsters and traverse the islands by building rafts each time more powerful.

Scenario :
The character is stranded on an island in the middle of the Pacific Ocean. After the event, he loses the trace of his family and the friends. He will soon realize that the island was already inhabited by other survivor. He even found gear outputs the imagination of developers. The mysteries of the islands will be at the heart of one of them.There where the sky is unified with monsters who are trying to destroy the world.
